comment.body:
> Cann't open. Which filter causes it?无法打开。哪个过滤器导致它？

你们无法打开网站吗？你们可能需要用中国大陆的网络进入，进入时需要填1234，然后才能进入，我要打开网站也是需要输入1234才能进去的

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: Maintenance of AnnoyancesFilter

labels.name: Infrastructure
labels.description: Related to the repository infrastructure

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Some rules are duplicate.

### Proposed solution

### cookies_specific.txt
```
###privacyAlert
###shop.disable::after
##.lightbox--cookie-consent
##.modal--cookie
##.sp-overlay
#$##PrivacyCategoryAlert { display: none !important; }
#$##cc--main { display: none !important; }
#$##cliSettingsPopup { display: none !important; }
#$#.cli-modal-backdrop { display: none !important; }
#$#.cli-barmodal-open { overflow: auto !important; }
```
### mobile-app_specific.txt
```
###body-fixed-footer
###branch-banner-iframe
```

### popups_specific.txt
```
##.jumpstart-player-sticky
##.jw-flag-floating > div.jw-wrapper
##.mask-laye-box
##.sign-in-box
##.modaal-overlay
##.popup-wrap
##.simplemodal-container
##.simplemodal-overlay
##.snp-overlay
###steady-floating-button-wrapper
###telegramModal
###NostoOverlay
#$#.modal-open { overflow: visible !important; }
#$##shopify-section-newsletter-popup { display: none !important; }
#$#.modal-backdrop { display: none!important; }
#$#body { overflow: visible!important; }
#$##modal-ads { display: none!important; }
```

### push-notifications_specific.txt
```
##.notice--enablePush
```


### subscriptions_specific.txt
```
##.article-afterbody
###soft-reg-wall-piano-id
###newsletter-signup-short-form
##.article-subscribe
##.footer-newsletter
##.googlenews
##.hero
##.subscribe_widget
##.send-us-your-news-cta
##div[class^="newsletter"]
```

### self-promo.txt
```
##.merch_component
##.sponsor
```

### Additional information

This is not all, but I think it will improve things a bit.

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151978#issuecomment-1569570963

카카오가 카카오톡에 인터넷 연결에 관계없이 고정해둔 빌트인 광고로 보입니다.
모든 네트워크를 꺼도 표시되며 카카오톡 앱을 수정하지 않는 이상 어떤 애드블록 (AdGuard와 유니콘 프로 포함)도 차단할 수 없을 거라고 판단됩니다.

또한, 웹 브라우저나 다른 앱에서 광고가 차단되지 않는다면, AdGuard 모드를 로컬 VPN 모드로 변경해주세요.

---

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151978#issuecomment-1569504211

The advertisement is blocked by List-KR filter and AdGuard Mobile Ad filter.
You can resolve your issue by the following instruction:
 1. Clear cache of KakaoTalk app.
 2. If 1st detail does not work, touch the advertisement for a while until advertisement option appears.
 2-1. Touch `Do not show this advertisement`.
 2-2. Now, any advertisement except build-in advertisement is no longer showed because AdGuard blocks such request.
 3. If 1st and 2nd details do not work, Please consider removing your 3rd-party filters except List-KR filter.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

그 광고는 List-KR 필터와 AdGuard 모바일 광고 필터로 차단되고 있습니다.
다음 방법으로 문제를 해결하실 수 있습니다:
  1. 카카오톡 앱의 캐시를 삭제해주세요.
  2. 첫번째 방법이 작동하지 않으면, 광고 옵션이 나올 때까지 광고를 터치하세요.
  2-1. `이 광고 보지 않기`를 누르세요.
  2-2. 이제 AdGuard가 그러한 요청을 차단하기 때문에 빌트인 광고외에 어떤 광고도 표시되지 않습니다.
  3. 민약 1번째과 2번째 방법이 작동하지 않으면, List-KR 필터를 제외한 제 3자 필터를 제거하는 것을 고려해주세요.

</details>

comment.body:
Is view set to recent posts?
If yes, please try this rule:
`facebook.com#$?#h2[dir="auto"] + div > div[class]:has( div[aria-posinset] div[style*="border-radius"] div[class] + div div[class] > div[class] > span[dir="auto"] > span[id] > span > span[class] > a[href] > span > span[aria-labelledby] svg > use[xlink\:href="#gid1"]) { height: 1px !important; visibility: hidden !important; }`

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
